column3: We should do this for hardcoded nodes as well?\n
Seed nodes are already ignored on testnet:\nif (mapAddresses.empty() && (GetTime() - nStart > 60 || fTOR) && !fTestNet)\n

It would appear that I am blind, anyway, printf moved (I was thinking hopefully someone would do dnsseeds for testnet in the distant future, but that shouldnt mean I put the printf out of the if now).\n
